title: I’m a Retired Cop & There Are Some Things I Still Haven’t Dealt With
description:
Today, we’re talking with a woman whose stepdaughter’s mom is a deadbeat, a retired cop who needs to heal from trauma, and a parent whose child’s PANDAS diagnosis has changed everything for their family. 
  How can I help my teenage stepdaughter work through issues with her mom?
 I’m a retired cop & there are some things I still haven’t dealt with
 How do I deal with my child's new PANDA diagnosis?
 https://pandasnetwork.org/
 Lyrics of the Day: "Pictures of You" - The Cure
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
